subject: resource/Love_Affair_(1994_film)
object: Love Affair is a 1994 romantic drama film, and a remake of the 1939 film of the same name.  It was directed by Glenn Gordon Caron and produced by Warren Beatty from a screenplay by Robert Towne and Beatty, based on the 1939 screenplay by Delmer Daves and Donald Ogden Stewart, based on the story by Mildred Cram and Leo McCarey. The music score was by Ennio Morricone and the cinematography by Conrad L.
